text: Bowna is a locality in the South East part of the Riverina, New South Wales, Australia. == Geography == Bowna is situated by road, about 7 kilometres (4.3 miles) south west of Mullengandra and 18 kilometres (11.2 miles) east of Table Top. == History == The former village of Bowna was inundated by the Hume Reservoir but the locality and community outside the village still exist. Bowna Post Office opened on 1 May 1869 and closed in 1994. ==Notes and references== Category:Towns in the Riverina Category:Towns in New South Wales
title: Bowna
